	def bindSlot(self):
		self.signal_refresh_chatMsgShowTextBrowser.connect(self.refresh_chatMsgShowTextBrowser)

	def refresh_chatMsgShowTextBrowser(self, msg):
		self.chatMsgShowTextBrowser.append(msg)
